item.title: Gamestop 和 AMC 在法兰克福大幅飙升，漫画股涨势如虹
item.description: 零售投资者的宠儿 GameStop 和 AMC Entertainment 在法兰克福上市的股票周三大涨，延续了本周的涨势，因为 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "基思-吉尔（"Roaring Kitty "Keith Gill）发布了帖子，他是 2021 Meme 股票狂潮背后的核心人物。【原文：Retail investor darlings GameStop and AMC Entertainment's Frankfurt-listed shares jumped on Wednesday, in a continuation of this week's rally after posts from "Roaring Kitty" Keith Gill a central figure behind the 2021 meme stock frenzy.】

item.title: 随着最后期限的临近，必和必拓对英美资源集团交易的选择余地越来越小
item.description: 必和必拓集团对竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American）的收购方案包括：提高其427亿美元收购报价的甜度、提出敌意收购或在5月22日提出有约束力收购要约的最后期限临近时暂时放弃。【原文：BHP Group's options for its pursuit of rival miner Anglo American include sweetening its $42.7 billion buyout offer, making a hostile bid or walking away for now as it approaches a May 22 deadline to lodge a binding offer.】

item.title: 日本瑞穗第四季度利润大幅增长，预计未来将实现增长
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group）周三公布，受海外业务和国内贷款需求的帮助，该公司第四季度利润大幅增长，超出预期。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group reported a big jump in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday that beat expectations, helped by its overseas business and demand for loans at home, and it forecast higher profit in the current financial year.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国警告 Raiffeisen 可能因俄罗斯问题而被限制进入美元系统
item.description: 据一位看到过信件的人士称，美国财政部曾书面警告 Raiffeisen Bank International，由于其与俄罗斯的交易，该银行进入美国金融系统的权限可能会受到限制。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International was warned by the U.S. Treasury in writing that its access to the U.S. financial system could be curbed because of its Russia dealings, according to a person who has seen the correspondence.】

item.title: 冬季预订量增加，TUI 第二季度亏损低于预期
item.description: 欧洲最大的旅游运营商 TUI 第二季度的营业亏损有所收窄，原因是其在北半球典型的冬季旅游淡季结束时的业绩好于预期。【原文：Europe's largest tour operator TUI narrowed its operating loss in the second quarter as its typically weak winter season in the Northern Hemisphere ended better than expected.】

item.title: 亚马逊网络服务公司计划在德国进行 84 亿美元的云计算投资
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）周三表示，该公司计划到2040年在德国投资78亿欧元（84.4亿美元），专门为欧洲建设云计算基础设施。【原文：Amazon Web Services (AWS) said on Wednesday it plans to invest 7.8 billion euros ($8.44 billion) in Germany through 2040 as it builds a cloud computing infrastructure specifically for Europe.】

item.title: 安联集团第一季度净利润增长 22%，好于预期
item.description: 德国安联保险公司（Allianz）周三表示，受财产险和意外险业务强劲增长的帮助，该公司第一季度净利润增长 22%，好于预期。【原文：Germany's Allianz posted a better-than-expected 22% rise in first-quarter net profit, helped by strength in its property and casualty insurance business, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 报告称冲突、高借贷成本阻碍了欧洲复兴开发银行地区的经济增长
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行（EBRD）在周三发布的半年度报告中称，两场战争和高昂的借贷成本削弱了欧洲复兴开发银行所覆盖国家的预期增长。【原文：Two wars and high borrowing costs have trimmed expected growth in countries covered by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), the bank said in a semi-annual report released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 市场持续低迷，蒂森克虏伯下调销售额和净利润
item.description: 德国企业集团蒂森克虏伯在三个月内第二次下调了 2023/24 年的销售和净利润预期，原因是钢铁部门的需求和价格下降，以及材料贸易部门的减值。【原文：German conglomerate Thyssenkrupp cut its 2023/24 forecast for sales and net profit for the second time in three months, blaming lower demand and prices at its steel unit as well as impairments at its materials trading division.】

item.title: E.ON 第一季度利润稳定，投资额增加四分之一
item.description: E.ON 周三公布的第一季度利润与去年同期相比基本保持稳定，并称投资增长了约四分之一，因为欧洲最大的能源电网运营商正在大规模增加电网支出。【原文：E.ON on Wednesday posted first-quarter profits that were roughly stable year-on-year, adding that investments were up by around a quarter as Europe's biggest operator of energy grids is massively ramping up spending on grids.】

item.title: 不管你喜欢还是讨厌，流行语股票又回来了
item.description: Meme 股票再次飙升，让粉丝们高兴，让反对者沮丧，也让华尔街看到，2021 年 GameStop 狂飙背后的社交媒体力量依然强劲。【原文：Meme stocks are soaring again, delighting fans, frustrating detractors and showing Wall Street that the social media force behind the wild GameStop rally in 2021 is still going strong.】

item.title: 早间竞价：鲍威尔的力量在美国 CPI 前提振股市
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国部分地区公用事业价格上涨，家庭再遭打击
item.description: 中国十多个城市的公用事业价格上涨可能会短暂地将全国通胀率从超低水平拉升，但最终可能会成为世界第二大经济体的通货紧缩力量，因为它们会进一步削弱家庭的消费能力。分析人士说，公用事业价格上涨会进一步削弱家庭的消费能力，最终可能成为世界第二大经济体的通货紧缩力量。【原文：Utility price hikes in more than 10 Chinese cities may briefly lift nationwide inflation from ultra-low levels, but could ultimately turn into a deflationary force in the world's no. 2 economy as they further erode the households' spending power, analysts say.】

item.title: 成功发布 SU7 后，小米成为中国第八大电动汽车新贵
item.description: 据行业数据显示，中国智能手机制造商小米已成为中国第八大电动汽车新贵，其首款车型SU7轿车4月份销量超过7000辆。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi has become the country's eighth-largest electric vehicle upstart after selling more than 7,000 units of its first model, the SU7 sedan, in April, according to industry data.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第一季度工资增长放缓，缓解通胀忧虑
item.description: 周三的数据显示，澳大利亚第一季度的工资增长出人意料地从15年来的高点放缓，这可能标志着本轮周期的顶峰，也是劳动力市场终于开始松动的另一个迹象。【原文：Australian wage growth unexpectedly slowed from 15-year highs in the first quarter, data showed on Wednesday, likely marking the peak for this cycle and another sign the labour market was finally starting to loosen.】

item.title: 美国通胀报告公布前股市上涨，美元走低
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市上涨，美元走低，原因是交易商权衡了好坏参半的美国生产者物价数据，并为当天晚些时候可能影响美联储近期政策路径的至关重要的消费者物价报告做好准备。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Wednesday while the dollar drifted lower as traders weighed mixed U.S. producer price data and braced for the crucial consumer price report later in the day that is likely to influence the Federal Reserve's near-term policy path.】

item.title: 索尼股价大涨 12%，原因是回购和分红计划以及利润展望的提高
item.description: 索尼集团承诺提高股东回报率，并预计在图像传感器业务的推动下，年度利润将有所增长，此后该公司股价在周三的东京早盘交易中大涨 12%。【原文：Shares in Sony Group jumped 12% in early Tokyo trading on Wednesday after the company pledged to boost shareholder returns and forecast higher annual profit with a boost from its image sensors business.】

item.title: 中国央行维持关键政策利率不变
item.description: 中国央行周三在展期到期的中期借贷便利（MLF）贷款时维持关键政策利率不变，符合市场预期。【原文：China's central bank left a key policy rate unchanged when rolling over maturing medium-term lending facility (MLF) loans on Wednesday, in line with market expectations.】

item.title: 聚焦：华为中国旗舰店激增预示着与苹果的对决
item.description: 华为正在改革其零售战略，并积极在中国开设旗舰店，其中一些与苹果商店仅咫尺之遥，以求在全球最大的智能手机市场重新夺回高端电子产品的宝座。【原文：Huawei is revamping its retail strategy and aggressively opening flagship stores in China, with some just a stone's throw away from Apple shops, as it seeks to retake the premium electronics throne in the world's biggest smartphone market.】

item.title: 美元在关键的 CPI 测试前下跌；日元承压
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元汇率接近一个月低点，国债收益率走低，交易员们在为当天晚些时候可能决定美联储政策走向的一份关键的美国通胀报告做准备。【原文：The dollar traded near a one-month low versus the euro on Wednesday amid lower Treasury yields as traders braced for a key U.S. inflation report later in the day that could dictate the path of Federal Reserve policy.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司首席执行官提出辞职，在美上市股票暴跌
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）表示，该公司首席执行官周二提出下台，投资者担心该公司可能受到更多政治干预，导致股价下滑。【原文：The chief executive of Brazilian state-run oil company Petrobras offered to step down on Tuesday, the company said, sending shares sliding as investors braced for the possibility of more political interference at the firm.】

item.title: 油价因加拿大野火和美国库存减少预期而上涨
item.description: 周三早盘，油价上涨，原因是加拿大的油砂受到大面积野火的威胁，而且市场预计美国原油和汽油库存将在当天晚些时候出现下降。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Wednesday as large wildfires were threatening Canada's oil sands and as the market expected U.S. crude oil and gasoline inventories to show a drawdown later in the day.】

item.title: 美联储施密德表示准备对政策保持耐心
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）周二表示，通胀率仍然过高，美国央行要做更多的工作来降低通胀率，这表明他支持在一段时间内保持美联储政策利率的稳定。【原文：Inflation is still too high, and the U.S. central bank has more work to do to bring it down, Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank President Jeffrey Schmid said on Tuesday, a signal that he supports keeping the Fed's policy rate steady for some time.】

item.title: 纽约银行将向摩根大通出售近 50 亿美元的抵押贷款仓库贷款
item.description: 陷入困境的地区性贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周二表示，已同意向摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）出售约 50 亿美元的抵押仓库贷款。【原文：Embattled regional lender New York Community Bancorp said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell about $5 billion in mortgage warehouse loans to JPMorgan Chase .】

item.title: 数字银行 Chime 在预期的首次公开募股前首次推出预支工资产品
item.description: 美国数字银行 Chime 正在推出一款产品，允许客户在发薪日之前动用最多 500 美元的工资，这是一家金融科技公司进军快速增长的 "工资收入动用 "市场的最新举措。【原文：U.S. digital bank Chime is launching a product that will allow customers to access up to $500 of their wages before payday, the latest move by a financial technology company to enter the fast-growing "earned wage access" market.】

item.title: 美国称波音违反 2021 年 737 MAX 延期起诉协议
item.description: 美国司法部周二晚些时候表示，波音公司违反了 2021 年协议中的义务，该协议规定波音公司在 2018 年和 2019 年 737 MAX 致命坠机事故中免于刑事起诉。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said late on Tuesday that Boeing Co had breached its obligations in a 2021 agreement that shielded the planemaker from criminal prosecution over fatal 737 MAX crashes in 2018 and 2019.】

item.title: 美国银行业监管机构宣布于 7 月 19 日就 Capital One-Discover 交易召开公开会议
item.description: 美国两家银行监管机构周二宣布，他们将于 7 月 19 日召开一次公开会议，就 Capital One Financial Corporation 收购 Discover Financial Services 的提议征求意见。【原文：A pair of U.S. banking regulators announced on Tuesday they would be hosting a public meeting on July 19 to solicit input on the proposed acquisition of Discover Financial Services by Capital One Financial Corporation .】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业 Canoo 第一季度亏损超预期
item.description: 电动汽车初创公司Canoo周二公布的第一季度亏损额超过预期，但对全年的展望保持不变。【原文：Electric vehicle startup Canoo posted a larger-than-expected loss for the first quarter on Tuesday, but kept its outlook for the year unchanged.】

item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: MSCI 公布季度指数审查结果
item.description: 指数提供商摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二表示，在进行季度审查后，其广受关注的摩根士丹利资本国际 ACWI 指数将增加 42 种证券，并剔除 121 种证券。【原文：Index provider MSCI said on Tuesday that 42 securities will be added and 121 securities removed from its widely followed MSCI ACWI index following its quarterly review.】
